body:
FILE PHOTO: Workers are seen behind the logo of U.S. jeweller Tiffany & Co. at a store at the Bahnhofstrasse shopping street in Zurich, Switzerland September 9, 2020. REUTERS/Arnd Wiegmann

(Reuters) - A Delaware judge scheduled a Sept. 21 hearing for Tiffany & Co to argue for expedited proceedings of its lawsuits seeking to hold LVHM to its proposed merger, according to a Monday court filing.
title: Tiffany to argue request to fast-track LVMH case on September 21
